condition.name: Expression: if (views != global_yt_autohd_views){ global_yt_autohd_views = views; return true } return false;

action.name: Control UI: _views = "com.google.android.apps.youtube.gaming:id/num_views"; if (existsElementById(_views)){ views = getTextById(_views); if (views != global_yt_autohd_views){ global_yt_autohd_views = views; } }
